title: FrontEnd Web Developer
description: Before I stepped in Adben Industries Pvt. Ltd. had no website. They wanted a website where they can tell people about their upcoming courses and products for IoT. I and my friend Ritankar Paul (check him out as well, he is an awesome guy!) made this website for Adben and the work is still in progress

title: Freelance Writer
description: As my first year internship, I worked as a freelance writer at agatton.com. I love writing content, you should check my blog in this portfolio
